resources.string: Trigger Name:
Trigger Percent:
Enter the name of the new Power Trigger here. Names are a single line in length, but should be able to handle any character.
Enter the percent that the Power Trigger should activate on. Percents are a non zero, positive number, and may not always run exactly depending on your current settings.
No Power Triggers! Make one down below!
Power Manager Modules
Each module focuses on a different component of power management.
Module Managed State
The mark on the side of each module conveys whether or not the module is currently controlled by Power Manager
Manage Switch
This switch controls whether or not the module is controlled by Power Manager
Preset Delay Times
When managed, the time selected her controls the delay before Power Manager begins controlling this component
Custom Delay Time
When managed, for more fine grained control, a custom time can be specified
Toggle Component On/Off
When selected, will toggle the component on or off depending on its current state
Periodic Automatic Toggle
Controls whether Power Manager will periodically toggle this component while the screen is off
Time Before Enable
Duration for how long the component should stay disabled before being toggled on
Time Before Disable
Duration for how long the component should stay enabled before being toggled off
